q: the tech industry. Eric Schmidt , Larry Page and Brin have long run Google as a trio, an approach they spelled out in an "owner's manual" included in the company's 2004 IPO filing. We run Google as a triumvirate, Larry Page and Brin wrote. "The three of us run the company collaboratively with Sergey and me as presidents. The structure is unconventional, but we have worked successfully in this way." Eric Schmidt said

, guaranteeing the future of the plant and all three shifts. "I am here with one message to tell you," Sergio Marchionne said after departing from his script and addressing the plant's workers. The future of this plant is without doubt guaranteed. Windsor Assembly is Chrysler's oldest plant and its only North American assembly plant running on three shifts. Eagles"> Philadelphia Eagles' Pro Bowl quarterback inked a two-year contract with Unequal Technologies, a provider of the football pads Michael Vick wore most of last season. at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role," said Andy Coulson , who has always denied any knowledge of wrongdoing at the newspaper. When the spokesman needs a spokesman it's time to move on, he said in a statement. David Cameron has repeatedly defended Andy Coulson , one of his inner circle, and on Friday defended his own judgment in hiring him after his resignation from the News of the World.

spark for Detroit after a slow stArt Bell, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Kings on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
